account:savetoken.name: account:savetoken
account:savetoken.description: Saves a TBA token that you issued previously in NetSuite.

account.name: account
account.description: References the ID of the account to log in to.

authid.name: authid
authid.description: References the custom name you gave to a specific account-role combination.

tokenid.name: tokenid
tokenid.description: Enter the token ID of a TBA token you issued previously in NetSuite.

tokensecret.name: tokensecret
tokensecret.description: Enter the token secret of a TBA token you issued previously in NetSuite.

url.name: url
url.description: Specify the NetSuite domain of the account you want to use. You only need to specify the NetSuite domain if you are not using a production account.

account:setup.name: account:setup
account:setup.description: Sets up an account to use with the SuiteCloud CLI for Node.js.

dev.name: dev
dev.description: Specify the NetSuite domain of the account you want to use. You only need to specify the NetSuite domain if you are not using a production account.
